name: ExtendedSpendRow
desc: The descriptions of metrics with dates.

items.name: avgCPA
items.desc: The average cost-per-acquisition (CPA) is the total spend divided by the number of installs within the same time period.

items.name: avgCPM
items.desc: The average CPM is the average amount you pay per one thousand ad impressions.

items.name: avgCPT
items.desc: The average cost-per-tap (CPT) is the ratio of spend over taps.

items.name: conversionRate
items.desc: The total number of conversions divided by the total number of taps within the same time period.

items.name: date
items.desc: The date range of the report. The format is MM-DD-YYYY HH.

items.name: impressions
items.desc: The number of times your ad appears in App Store search results within the reporting period.

items.name: installs
items.desc: The total number of newDownloads or redownloads resulting from an ad within the reporting period. The API attributes Apple Search Ads installs within a 30‑day tap-through window.

items.name: latOffInstalls
items.desc: The installs from users who don’t have Limit Ad Tracking (LAT) in an enabled state on their devices.

items.name: latOnInstalls
items.desc: The installs from users who have Limit Ad Tracking (LAT) in an enabled state on their devices.

items.name: localSpend
items.desc: The total spend of a campaign in the currency the organization uses.

items.name: newDownloads
items.desc: The enumerated app downloads from new users without previous installs of your app.

items.name: redownloads
items.desc: The enumerated reinstalls of your app from users with previous installs.

items.name: taps
items.desc: The number of times users tap your ad within the reporting period.

items.name: ttr
items.desc: The tap-through rate (TTR) is the number of times users tap your ad divided by the total impressions your ad receives.
